document.full_text: football's under-fire world governing body fifa could disappear into a "black hole" if qatar's mohamed bin hamman wins next month's leadership election, long-serving president sepp blatter said on friday.
document.title: blatter says hammam win would leave fifa in 'black hole'
lines_and_colors: football's under-fire world governing body fifa could disappear into a "black hole" if qatar's mohamed bin hamman wins next month's leadership election, long-serving president sepp blatter said on friday.
